ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
pyOutlook was created after I found myself attempting to connect to
the Outlook REST API in multiple projects. This provided some much
needed uniformity. It’s easier to deal with than the win32com package
by Microsoft, but obviously has a far smaller scope.
about.summary: A Python module for connecting to the Outlook REST API

about.description:
pyOutlook was created after I found myself attempting to connect to
the Outlook REST API in multiple projects. This provided some much
needed uniformity. It’s easier to deal with than the win32com package
by Microsoft, but obviously has a far smaller scope.
about.summary: A Python module for connecting to the Outlook REST API

name: pyoutlook
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyOutlook" %}
{% set version = "5.0.0" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name | lower }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1e4d9b3e2ade410f79cb9d976d02a8dc8d69232f051d6e553225aed31698f828

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - python-dateutil
    - requests
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - python-dateutil
    - requests

test:
  imports:
    - pyOutlook
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://gitlab.com/jensastrup/pyOutlook
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A Python module for connecting to the Outlook REST API'
  description: |
    pyOutlook was created after I found myself attempting to connect to
    the Outlook REST API in multiple projects. This provided some much
    needed uniformity. It’s easier to deal with than the win32com package
    by Microsoft, but obviously has a far smaller scope.
  doc_url: https://pyoutlook.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://gitlab.com/jensastrup/pyOutlook

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
